title: Ep 57: Skincare Enthusiast with Ann Shen
itunes:title: Ep 57: Skincare Enthusiast with Ann Shen
itunes:subtitle: This week, Kate goes on a girls trip to Palm Springs, confesses to sneaking peeks at Twitter, and works on sleep training herself to rise earlier. Doree recaps her time at the BeautyX Summit, revisits some makeup faves, and shares her recent obsession:...
description:
This week, Kate goes on a girls trip to Palm Springs, confesses to sneaking peeks at Twitter, and works on sleep training herself to rise earlier. Doree recaps her time at the BeautyX Summit, revisits some makeup faves, and shares her recent obsession: the Netflix show Sex Education.

Then they welcome illustrator and author, Ann Shen. She talks about becoming an artist later in life, her morning and nighttime skincare routines, her passion for fake eyelashes, and how she deals with hormonal acne. You can find Ann on Instagram at @AnnDanger.

Follow us on Instagram: @Forever35podcast,@katespencer,@doree, Twitter:@forever35pod, and in ourFacebook group(password is "serums"). All products mentioned on the show can be found on our website,Forever35podcast.com. To leave us a voicemail, call 781-591-0390, or you can email us at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

This episode is sponsored by:

  • Scentbird - Get 50% your first month today! Just visit scentbird.com/forever35 and use promo code forever35.
  • ThirdLove - Get 15% off your first order at thirdlove.com/forever.
  • LOLA - For 40% off your subscription, visit mylola.com and use promo code forever35.
  • Joybird - Receive 25% off your first order! Go to joybird.com/forever35 with promo code forever35.
  • HelloFresh - Get $80 off your first month! Visit hellofresh.com/forever80 and enter promo code forever80.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
